name: Tarot Tower
description:
Have you ever heard of Tarot?

Dive right into the unknown and leave your fate to the cards. Defend the tower with the help from our warriors and spells.

 

Tarot Tower is a single player tower defense game, in which the goal is to protect your castle with the help of the arcana. You draw three cards before each wave, which you can use to defend yourself. If you don't like the cards, you have the possibility to draw new cards. Be careful tho... Your options are limited.

Character Illustration:

Maxim Semenchenko

Game Assets:

Anna T. Schwarzmayer

UI/UX Design:

Concept Art:

Emily Reichert
